name: Please Take Two
description:
Created for Mini Jam 66 which had a theme of Sweets and a limitation of two buttons.

The game is a platformer which is played entirely with the left and right mouse button. But how can you walk left and right, jump, crawl, and open doors with just two buttons? Magical candy of course! Collect the stars and beat all 9 levels!

(Also, yes. The character design is mildly cursed.)
